The district capital is the city of Portalegre. == Municipalities == The district has 15 municipalities: * Alter do Chão * Arronches * Avis * Campo Maior * Castelo de Vide * Crato * Elvas * Fronteira * Gavião * Marvão * Monforte * Nisa * Ponte de Sor * Portalegre * Sousel Category:Districts of Portugal
title: Portalegre District
